originalText.text: Dr. S and his team are amazing. I do not trust anyone else with my care. They are the best in NYC and the care and aftercare they give you cannot be surpassed by any other team. I highly recommend Luxurgery for all of your surgical and non surgical needs. Dr. S has the best eye of any plastic surgeon I have ever met and he is not only meticulous but kind and caring. You will be in the best hands. I highly recommend!

text.text: Dr. S and his team are amazing. I do not trust anyone else with my care. They are the best in NYC and the care and aftercare they give you cannot be surpassed by any other team. I highly recommend Luxurgery for all of your surgical and non surgical needs. Dr. S has the best eye of any plastic surgeon I have ever met and he is not only meticulous but kind and caring. You will be in the best hands. I highly recommend!

originalText.text: I have known Dr. Shridharani for over 10 years. During this time I have trusted him with many procedures on my entire family. The office staff is extremely professional and treats each patient as if they are  royalty. Dr. S has performed many procedures on us from the smallest cyst removal to major surgical procedures; not only is his work beyond reproach, but his bedside manner in addition to the rapport he builds with his patients is of the highest standard. My family is and will continue to be lifetime patients of Dr. S.

originalText.text:
I recently had the privilege of being under the care of Dr. S, a highly skilled and compassionate plastic surgeon who performed a breast reduction surgery that has profoundly changed my life. From the very beginning, Dr. S's professionalism, expertise, and genuine concern for my well-being were evident, making my experience truly exceptional.

First and foremost, Dr. S's expertise in plastic surgery is exemplary. Throughout the entire process, he demonstrated a deep knowledge of the intricacies of breast reduction procedures, ensuring that I felt confident and well-informed every step of the way. His attention to detail was apparent in the comprehensive pre-operative consultations, during which he patiently listened to my concerns, answered all my questions, and provided me with a clear understanding of the procedure, its potential outcomes, and the recovery process.

On the day of the surgery, Dr. S's calm and reassuring demeanor immediately put me at ease. His surgical skills were nothing short of remarkable. The procedure went smoothly, and I felt secure knowing that I was in the hands of an experienced and talented surgeon. Dr. S's precision and meticulousness were evident in the results, as he expertly reshaped and reduced my breasts, achieving a natural and aesthetically pleasing outcome that far exceeded my expectations.

Equally impressive was Dr. S's unwavering commitment to patient care and well-being. Throughout my recovery, he provided continuous support and guidance, ensuring that my healing process was as comfortable and smooth as possible. Dr. S's genuine compassion and empathy were evident in his regular follow-up appointments, during which he attentively monitored my progress, addressed any concerns I had, and provided valuable advice on scar management and aftercare.

Beyond his technical skills and medical expertise, Dr. S truly goes above and beyond to create a welcoming and supportive environment for his patients. His friendly and approachable nature fostered a trusting doctor-patient relationship, allowing me to openly express my fears and expectations without hesitation. Dr. S's ability to listen attentively and respond with empathy made me feel valued and understood, further enhancing the overall experience and instilling me with a sense of confidence and trust in his care.

In conclusion, I cannot recommend Dr. S highly enough. His exceptional skills as a plastic surgeon, combined with his genuine compassion and dedication to his patients, make him a standout professional in his field. My breast reduction surgery with Dr. S has not only improved my physical well-being but has also had a profound impact on my self-confidence and overall quality of life. If you are considering any plastic surgery procedure, I wholeheartedly encourage you to consult with Dr. S. You can trust that you will be in the hands of a true expert who will prioritize your well-being and deliver outstanding results.

-CM

originalText.text: I have consulted and received Sculptra injection at Luxurgery by Dr S. He and his staff are most kind and knowledgable. Since I have many drug and food allergies, he even made sure if I would react to it by injecting a small amount on my chin area two weeks before the actual treatment. The staff checks on patient the day after by phone and than again in one week via webcall where the doctor also joins in to check any reaction to the treatment. All and all very satisfied and higly recommend.

originalText.text: I received a lower blepharoplasty about 12 days ago from Dr. Shridharani and I am completely satisfied. I had minimal swelling after the surgery and was just a little sore. It's been almost 2 weeks and you can't even tell I had surgery other than the bags are gone. I would like to publicly thank the whole Luxurgery team. Everyone involved was great. If you are reading this and thinking about getting a lower blepharoplasty, I definitely recommend Dr. Shridharani.
